title: Create aesthetic home page with call-to-action for resume tailoring

requirements.text: Create a new Home page component that serves as the landing page with an aesthetic design that entices users to explore the resume tailoring feature

quotes: home page is more asthhetic give user to lure to open the tailoring section

acceptanceCriteria: Landing page exists with visually appealing design distinct from the current tailor page
Design uses cohesive color palette and typography consistent with the existing ink/paper theme
Layout draws attention to the primary call-to-action button

requirements.text: Add a prominent call-to-action button on the home page labeled 'Tailor Resume' that navigates users to the resume tailoring interface

quotes: a button shows ttailor resume tthen go for tthis ttailor ai tto appear

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the button transitions user to the resume tailoring page (TailorResumePage)
Button is visually emphasized as the primary action on the page

requirements.text: Update App.tsx to implement routing that shows the new home page by default and navigates to TailorResumePage when the call-to-action is clicked

quotes: tthen go for tthis ttailor ai tto appear

acceptanceCriteria: Home page renders at the root route
Tailor resume page is accessible via navigation from home page
Navigation flow works in both directions if needed

requirements.text: Design the home page with compelling copy and visual elements that communicate the value proposition of AI-powered resume tailoring to attract users

quotes: give user to lure to open the tailoring section

acceptanceCriteria: Page includes headline and supporting text explaining resume tailoring benefits
Visual hierarchy guides user attention toward the call-to-action
Design feels polished and professional to build trust

constraints: Maintain the existing ink/paper aesthetic using the OKLCH color system defined in index.css
Do not modify the core TailorResumePage functionality or components
Preserve the existing header with logo and PublishGuidance in App.tsx
nonGoals: Redesigning the existing resume tailoring interface
Adding authentication or user accounts to the home page
Creating multiple landing page variants or A/B testing

required: Hero background illustration with professional resume or document theme, gradient subtle tones (hero-background.dim_1920x1080.png)
